description: The Canon NB-2LH rechargeable battery pack for Canon digital cameras features lithium-ion technology for maximum battery life power. It retains full charge capacity after multiple recharges, making it free from memory effect. It is extremely lightweight and easy to carry.Compatible with:Digital Rebel XTElura 40mcElura 50Elura 60Elura 65Elura 70Elura 80Elura 85Elura 90Optura 30Optura 40Optura 50Optura 60Optura 400Optura 500PowerShot S30PowerShot S40PowerShot S45PowerShot S50PowerShot S60PowerShot S70ZR100ZR200ZR300ZR400
title: Canon NB-2LH Rechargeable Battery Pack for Rebel XT/XTi Digital SLR Cameras and VIXIA HV Series and ZR Series Camcorders - Retail Packaging
